sources.title: Battle Of Blood Island (HQ)
sources.description: 1960 directed by Joel Rapp starring Richard Devon and Ron Gans.  After the lowest-budget amphibious landing in military history, two American G.I.’s are left stranded on an island with vicious, roaming Japs. Will they outsmart the cunning Japs and survive? Roger Corman served as Executive Producer and appears as a soldier on a hill.  This copy has been sharpened a bit.
